itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Graham Allen discuss the possibility of the government having an internet kill switch, Trump going to London, the best drive-thru burgers in the U.S debate, if Graham would ever run for office, and the Drinkin' Bro of the Week who might be the best DB of the week ever.
